reviews.review: Que Jogo sem palavras !!!

Bioshock Infinite é simplesmente fantástico, apesar de ser um jogo de 2013 sua beleza ainda surpreende hoje em dia. Com jogabilidade precisa e historia envolvente, esse sem duvida é o melhor da franquia. Vale a pena o investimento para compor sua biblioteca. 
Aviso - caso você não tenha jogado ainda, se prepare para explodir sua mente,

Gráficos -9/10 - evelheceu muito bem
Jogabilidade 8/10 - conceito antigo de fps, mas responde com precisão
Historia - 10/10 - Quase aranquei as penas da cabeça

Compre em Sales no combo Bioshock Trilogy Pack que compensa mais ainda, e vale a pena pegar os DLCs
伊丽莎白小姐，我能喜欢你么？

As someone who played the two previous bioshock games, Bioshock Infinite takes a different feel but is still a great game. If you enjoyed the tight spaces of Rapture, you may not enjoy Infinite as it takes place in a much larger bright place(on the surface). However, even if you have or haven't played the previous games, Bioshock Infinite is great with an amazing story, great gameplay, and fresh graphics. 10/10
Gameplay is fucking terrible, story is really good tho. Just Watch the cutscenes on youtube and youll get the best of the game
A fucking masterpiece

I just realized I dont have a review for this game. I feel obligated to write a review due to the amount of fun I had with this gun, albeit some screaming.

Bioshock Infinite is the third game in the Bioshock Franchise. One does not have to play Bioshock 1 & 2 to understand Infinite, however the ending and the DLC tie in with Bioshock 1's Rapture. The story here is really good, the main characters are lovable, and the world feels very vibrant maxed out. Now onto one of those cheesy scoring graphs:

Visuals: Fandiddlytastic
Atmosphere: Awesome
Gameplay: Really Solid
Replayibility: Decent
Story: Really Good
Music/Soundtrack: Some Places A Lil Lacking, and Some Places Excel

All in all, just get the Bioshock Collection when it goes on sale for 15 bucks. However if you are one of those people who keeps their libraries limited get Bioshock Infinite + Season Pass. I really enjoyed my time with this game, I feel as though everyone should try it.

Одна из лучших игр в которые мне доводилось играть.

不得不说真是神作，画面，剧情，音乐，优化等等，玩这个游戏简直是一种享受，一部自己操作的大片

This game is a great addition to the bioshock series, but it still doesnt fell like bioshock sometimes. The level design all just feels broing and repetitive, its always just a centre part to the level with parts of it leading to different places, go to these places, kill some people and go back to the centre and repeat. The way you can only hold two weapons at once is stupid as you will not be suited out for all the different situations because you dont want to get rid of the gun you like. The enemies in general seem lifeless compared to the splicers and big daddies of the first two bioshocks, and thats without the handymen. The handymen are pointless enemies that jst waste all your ammo and are just really anoying to come accros, you dont even feel the sorrow you are meant to feel for them when you kill these humans locked in a robot body. The story for this game however is amazing with a great ending and the city of columbia is always pleasing to look at, it has some great characters as well, the lutece twins were my favourite but elizabeth just runs around and chucks ammo at you, she only gets more interesting towords the end of the game. Overall only get this game with the rest of the collection if you havent played the other two, and get it on sale.
Good game. Go for it.

Un de mes jeux préférés ! Se termine en moins de trente heures si vous n'avez pas trop d'embûches (ou en encore moins de temps si vous n'êtes pas moi ahahha! ), et agréable de pouvoir retourner à certains chapitres pour pouvoir débloquer des succès pas encore ouvert. Le graphisme est WOW, l'image est belle, les personnages attachants, et la fin aurait pu être développée encore et encore car elle laisse sur une certaine faim. Des coucous à des moments historiques, un monde magique, et un prophète assez cruel ! 

Seul hic, à certains moments on doit refaire une trèeèes grande partie du trajet dejà parcouru pour finalement revenir à un endroit de sauvegarde, et se buter à des combats parfois un peu frustrants.

Alors que couple Lutèce peut parfois vous laisser des frissons, la ville dans laquel nous jouons, Colombia, peut facilement vous faire rêver !
Great game with one of the best stories I've played thorugh. Easily reccomended.

花了一个晚上通关，游戏流程不算长，但内容足够丰富了。
对我来说这游戏分三个部分:1.还没有见到伊丽莎白、2.和伊丽莎白并肩作战、3.伊丽莎白被带走自己孤身一人。
第一部分打怪搜刮+看风景，第二部分打怪+看伊丽莎白，第三部分怂+赶路救伊丽莎白。
我不能没有伊丽莎白！！！

I played this on the hard difficulty on max settings. the variety of weapons, plasmids (no, I will never call them anything else >:3) and enemies is quite good. I enjoyed the pacing of the game and the general level design. As a Bioshock game, as far as ambience, overall tone, thematic complexity and lasting impressions go I would actually call it a massive let down.  However, taken at face value as its own thing Bioshock infinite is a really interesting, exciting shooter well worth your time and money. I found the story to be a bit weak and convoluted myself, it does its job well enough but just didn't really resonate with me the way bioshock 1 and even 2 did (played on PS3 back in the day). I could see a lot of the big twists coming quite far in advance and felt the usage of Elizabeth was very poor as opposed to the hype surrounding her. Maxed out the game is a gem, it's not too punishing on the hardware for the amount of eye candy Bioshock Infinite gives you. Sound is great too, everything pops, guns have a nice good punch to them and the music fits the mood in most areas. I was also well satisfied with the overall length of the game. I just rushed through the campaign without much in the way of extras or exploration but wasn't ever bored over the course of my 9 hours, going at an admitedly fast pace. Mechanically the combat is satisfying and offers you plenty of options with regards to how you want to deal with situations. This is why I recommend the game even if for me it fails as a Bioshock game, it succeeds very well as a steampunk shooter and particularly those into that style ought to enjoy this game.

Eigentlich ein sehr geniales, optisch ansprechendes Spiel mit einer tollen Handlung, aaaber: ein Plotbreaker zu Beginn des Kapitels "Hand of the Prophet". Ich befinde mich anscheinend außerhalb der Karte, bekomme die ganze Zeit Schaden und kann überhaupt nichts machen. Problemlösungen aus dem Forum (Settings verändern, nochmal probieren) brachten mir leider gar nichts. Somit kann ich das Spiel nicht zuende bringen, was sehr schade ist. Traurig, dass so ein Bug nicht behoben wird.

Bioshock is, to me, one of the greatest FPS of all the times. But its sequels haven't live up to the first instalment.

This game story feels to plain, forced, chiche and desperate for surprising you. In comparison to the first game in wich everything feels as part of a natural progression of the narrative.
In Infinite the end is just laughable, tries too hard to blow your mind and just takes you a second to realize that makes no sense.
Gameplay wise no improvement either, to not make the game a giant escort mission they just completely eliminate the  "Elizabeth factor" instead of doing someting original. The level dising is nothig that stands out. 

This is just another mediocre single player FPS to add to the pile, whit a big name and a franchise fandom

[b]在舱门里看到 Columbia 的第一眼时，BioShock Infinite 就把我折服了：

浓浓的 [i]蒸汽朋克[/i]   和 [i]宗教元素[/i]  结合，直接将游戏升华至一款熠熠生辉的艺术品，内心的一喜一忧从那一瞬间就已不属于我，毫无防备地被游戏夺去。

这种感觉，是空前的。

我想，每位玩家通关此游戏之后，都会打心底的感到空虚和寂寞；
不过——经历了这款游戏更让我明白[/b]：[h1]只玩网游而不懂得欣赏单机游戏的玩家是遗憾的！！！[/h1]

A beautiful, visually rich game with an interesting back story. Had I known better, I would had played the first two Bioshock games beforehand since they seem to pale in comparison to this one. I haven't played a lot of games of this style, but I was truly addicted once I got started. Exploring Columbia in the clouds was really fun. I was a fan of the weird potions and abilities that Booker DeWitt gets, the sky hook, the additional qualities that Elizabeth brings to the game, and the storyline, particularly the end. I wish I could play it fresh all over again.

One of my favorite games in the last few years. It is a FPS/RPG with in comparison to earlier bioshock games more emphasis on run and gun shooting and less strategizing. The story and world building are on center stage in this game and the best part of it. While if I had to criticize one thing about it is that it lost some character to accommodate the more open spaced combat.

This is a great game series and this particular title is about the same quality as the original.  The combination of story & game-play are very well done as with the other BioShock games.  It would be nice if other games had more challenging and interesting stories like this game.  

My only complaint is the ending had a couple plot holes (inconsistencies) and various unanswered questions which are of lesser importance.  Unfortunately these plot holes are real and did hurt my final enjoyment of the game.  With that said, it was still a great game and is highly recommended especially considering not many people will notices these plot holes / issues.



If you are curious about the plot holes I mentioned, the larger plot hole / plot issue is discussed below.  The link talks about both BioShock Infinite & the DLCs, SPOILER ALERT obviously;
http://steamcommunity.com/app/8870/discussions/0/558751812678214123/

玩到结局时我是一脸懵逼的，全程在电脑屏幕前持续看到自己的??(0_0)??脸，然而结局居然是刀子？！Elizabeth这么可爱这么天使你居然递刀子？！还是那种 捅一刀 撒点盐 帮你包扎好 让你自己慢慢感受痛苦 又说不出痛在哪的难受

虽然bioshock是我比较不感兴趣的射击类游戏，但是就是一次次控制不住自己打开游戏玩下去，大概是剧情，画面和射击感实在是太完美了

刚看完解析，所以我踏马是操作了一个不存在的主角陪着一个不存在的NPC玩了一个不存在的游戏？？

"Bring das Mädchen - und Deine Schulden sind getilgt." Eigentlich ein simpel klingender Job für Booker DeWitt, der nach Colombia aufbricht, um Elizabeth zu finden und zurück zu bringen. Per Ruderboot geht es direkt stimmungsvoll zum Absetzpunkt, während man noch den wirren Gesprächen der anderen Bootsinsassen lauscht, wird man auch bereits mit ersten Fakten konfrontiert und an einem Leuchtturm abgesetzt. In einem bizarren Leuchtturm startet unser Abenteuer ...

2K Games erzählte in 2013 bereits abermals ein weiteres, echtes Bioshock-Erlebnis. Mit "Infinite" hat sich buchstäblich ein sehr würdiger Nachfolger entpuppt und hat mich ab der ersten Minute der Spielzeit wirklich abgeholt. Gestern - nach etwas weniger als 12 Stunden Spielzeit (es wirkt so wahnsinnig kurz) - saß ich hier und verlor mich im Ende und den anschließenden Gedanken dazu. Erwähnt sei, dass ich während des Gamings eine eigene Theorie entwickelt, wie es endet - ich lag total falsch.

Bugs hatte ich bei einem nun vier Jahre alten Titel keine. Das Spiel hatte an ein, zwei Stellen etwas Schwierigkeiten mit Content laden und Profil speichern ... aber einfach entspannt bleiben ... den Aussetzer von zirka vier Sekunden überlebt man - es ist kein BOD. ;)

Musikalisch fand ich es sehr stimmig (in den Credits fand ich den Mini-Eindruck hinter die Kulissen sehr schön). Atmosphäre ist also ganz klar geschaffen - und davon lebt ein Titel wie Bioshock schließlich. Tropfen, Regen, Klappern, Waffensounds ... Biester, Mechaniken, Stimmen (gespielt auf deutscher Sync) ... das klang über die Studiokopfhörer sehr hörenswert wie beeindruckend.

So ... Action und Gameplay! Ich war nur irritiert von "F" statt "E" für aktive Nutzung etc. Ansonsten bedarf es null Konfiguration am WASD (jau, Geschmackssache - klaro!). Häufiger Probleme machte da eher die Sprint-Taste, welche "plötzlich" mal aussetzte (natürlich dann, wenn man das Weite suchen wollte; gern gegen einen "Handyman"). Aber auch darüber kann man wegsehen. Die Action ist variabel und es fällt nur bedingt auf, dass es sich wiederholt. Mit Stealth kommt man leider nicht immer voran - Konfrontation ist also immer gewährleistet. Also mal nicht so zimperlich und denkt immer an genügend Munition (blöd, wenn einem die metallenen Flitzer ausgehen und nirgends ein Automat hörbar ist).

Mimimi hier und da gäbe es (Linearität in den Waypoints, KI unbeholfen) ... aber als das Game zu Ende war (Achtung, Credits laufen lassen!) und man sich bewusst macht, warum es genau als Story so geschrieben ist ... fetter Daumen ganz fett nach oben! Hat mir seeehr gut gefallen und von sowas wünsche ich mir schlichtweg mehr.

Als alt gewordener Gamer spiele ich bevorzugt Games mit starker Story. Ich brauche schlichtweg eine Handlung und einen roten Faden (vgl. guter Kinofilm). "Infinite" (der Name ist wirklich sehr gut gewählt) überzeugte bei mir primär mit dem Handling und unbedingt der Story. Wer von einem Spiel erwartet, unendliche Nebenquests zu bekommen, Dialoge mit Charakteren zu führen oder seine Waffen selbst zu basteln - nein. Aber es ist so stimmig in sich und auch so schön erzählt, dass man am Ende traurig ist, wenn es vorbei ist.

Danke für Dein Interesse.

Welcome to the city of Columbia!A city floating amongst the clouds,cruising far above sea level.This is a place unlike any you've ever seen.

The story is about a man called Booker DeWitt who was sent to the lost city to rescue a young lady,imprisoned there since her childhood.

The game is absolutely atmospheric and stunning.A FPS genre game and a good one at that.It is what i like to call an "epic journey" and i think this really suits it.Within your gameplay,you will discover Columbia and it's secrets.The game itself will make you want to discover more than just that though and this is something that captured my attention.I don't like to stick only to the story so i had to do a bit more of exploration.What makes this game unique is not only it's amazing detailed places,story and design,but also how helpful Elizabeth is when you are in need.

One thing is guaranteed.You will be amazed and confused with the ending.It puts your mind to work and makes you question what really happened.

If you need a good FPS game with a guaranteed beautiful story then BioShock Infinite is for you.

So grab your guns and bon voyage!

QUE JOGO FANTÁSTICO!!!! TÃO BOM QUANTO O PRIMEIRO!!!

E consequentemente.....melhor que o segundo.

Bioshock Infinite não é exatamente a continuação dos 2 primeiros Bioshock. Na verdade, é uma história completamente diferente. Desta vez, a ação se passa na cidade de Columbia, uma cidade nas nuvens, literalmente, pois ela foi construída no céu, diferente da cidade de Rapture, que ficava no fundo do mar. O jogo também se passa antes de Bioshock 1.

Apesar de o jogo ser muito mais violento que os outros 2, ele é totalmente voltado para a ação, diferente do estilo Survival Horror do 1 e do 2.

Os gráficos são os melhores da série, e estão muito mais atraentes ao jogar do que nas imagens divulgadas do jogo.

Mas o melhor do jogo é a história, pois na minha opinião, ela é melhor e mais surpreendente do que a do primeiro jogo, sendo um dos jogos com a melhor história que já joguei. E o final entrou na lista de um dos finais mais surpreendentes da história. Se você gosta de finais surpresa, não deixe de jogar esse jogo que é obrigatório para você.

Os pontos negativos ficam por conta da dificuldade do jogo, ou melhor dizendo, da falta dela. O jogo é incrivelmente o mais fácil dos 3. Não há absolutamente nenhum inimigo que represente um perigo real, sendo o Handyman o único que chega a apresentar algum desafio.

Em relação às armas, você só pode carregar 2 ao mesmo tempo, tendo que trocar as armas para jogar com outras. Os plasmids foram trocados pelos Vigores, que tem poderes bem distindos dos outros Bioshocks, mas são bem divertidos - é uma delícia atirar corvos ou eletrocutar os inimigos. Destaque para o canhão de mão - você não pode deixar de experimentar dar um headshot com essa arma....é lindo!!!!

Recomendadíssimo: 10/10.

Wonderful game. Great graphics and EPIC story. The gameplay is lit.

Oyun 2013te çıkmasına rahmen grafikleri hala göz kamaştırıyor.Hikayeside çok sağlam.Henüz 7 saat oynamış olmama rahmen oyunun güzeliğine hayran kaldım tek sorun adamlar her zepline parise gitmek için bindiğinde zeplin düşüyor yada zepline başka bir şey oluyor uyuz oldum.Oyundaki iksirler oyuna ayrı bir eğlence katıyor.Oyundaki kadın karakter Elizabethi sikmek istiyorsun ama malesef bir türlü siktiğiniz bir sahneye gelmiyorsunuz.

다깨면 눈물흘림
elizabeth

Surprised I liked this more than the previous 2. I'm usually a "they overdid/ruined it this time"-anti-sequel-tard.

- Only having 2 guns at a time makes you want to experiment with new ones enemies carry even if it's only out of necessity/ammo savings.
 The spells are ALOT more fun and allow creative gameplay when combining with gear pieces you find.
 Elizabeth's power incentivizes you to use the whole combat area instead of hunkering down in a chosen corner until it's over (you can still do it but will find many reasons not to):
 "Time to get ammo, time to get a healthkit, time to change location because of impedding doom so make me extra cover" etc - so for many reasons, this tittle awards tactical and creative decision making alot. 

- Your adventure buddy is the most fun companion I ever had in a video game. It's a nice compromise between being useful and a welcome addition to the battle without being a combatant (doesn't take the action away from your barbaric hands).
She will ocasionally give you something that is actually needed but will also let you know if that is not possible at the moment so you don't hesitate and freeze waiting for her to find something, you do your thing and she will help when she can. Pro tip: if you feel combat is nearly over and she finds something like salts get it as you finish or before ending combat.
 
If we made a graphic for video games npc companions:

with X variant ranging between "annoying" and "Very enjoyable" 
while the Y variant ranges between "Useless or even negatively impacting your team" and "Overpowered contribution that makes for boring fights"

Elizabeth would have to be really high on X and on a nice middle to lower Y value. While RE4's Ashley would be a dot you can barely see near the X and Y intersection ( 0 )

- If you are familiar with shooters do yourself a favor and unlock "1999 mode" from the go and see how you feel playing that, it is immensily fun. As soon as you get a pistol in your hand you will notice the big difference in visual responsiveness from enemies that are being shot. You will also notice how they alternate  between seeking cover and flushing you out and coordinate, they will not always do what you want so re-think how to lay those traps. It's above average combat A.I.

- Don't overthink the story, it becomes pretty clear cut later and makes sense. But if you like imagining possibilities when reading or watching a mystery, then do!

Nice twist btw.
Un grand classique autant pour l'histoire que pour le gameplay qui change sur le 1, 2, 3. L'histoire est vraiment originale mais pour la comprendre il faut finir les trois volets.
This is one of the games I wish could play again and again without knowing the story at all every time I play again. One of the best story based games out there.

色彩斑斓的世界，瞠目结舌的剧情，美丽可爱的傻白。

当然，如果你是单纯FPS向的玩家，那么推荐度可能只有6、7分；但如果你想在忙碌生活之余，在家中进行一次“说走就走”的奇妙旅程，推荐度上不封顶。
